author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stemmer Imaging H1 EBITDA Of EUR 4.6 Mln, Up 36.2 Pct
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Stemmer Imaging AG:
* YEAR FORECAST * SEES THAT EBITDA FOR FULL YEAR 2017/2018 WILL BE SIGNIFICANTLY HIGHER THAN PREVIOUSLY EXPECTED
* AT EUR 47.4 MILLION, REVENUES FOR H1 WERE 12.6 PERCENT HIGHER THAN YEAR-AGO (H1 2016/2017: EUR 42.1 MILLION)
* POSSIBLE TO GENERATE 2018 REVENUES BETWEEN EUR 97 TO EUR 100 MILLION WITH A DOUBLE-DIGIT EBITDA MARGIN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
